code:
case "$(uname -s)" in
    Darwin*)
        echo "macOS detected"
        brew install cmake || (echo "Homebrew not found. Install it first." && exit 1)
        ;;
    Linux*)
        echo "Linux detected"
        sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y cmake
        ;;

esac

cmake --version || echo "CMake installation failed"

mkdir -p build

if [[ $(uname -s) == "Linux" && -x "$(command -v nvidia-smi)" ]]; then
    cmake -B build -DSD_CUBLAS=ON
elif [[ $(uname -s) == "Darwin" ]]; then
    cmake -B build -DSD_METAL=ON
else
    cmake -B build
fi

cmake --build build --config Release

mkdir -p models

if [ ! -f models/flux1-schnell-q4_k.gguf ]; then
    wget -nc -O models/flux1-schnell-q4_k.gguf "https://huggingface.co/leejet/FLUX.1-schnell-gguf/resolve/main/flux1-schnell-q4_k.gguf"
else
    echo "Model already exist."
fi

if [ ! -f models/ae.safetensors ]; then
    wget -nc -O models/ae.safetensors "https://huggingface.co/black-forest-labs/FLUX.1-schnell/resolve/main/ae.safetensors"
else
    echo "ae.safetensors exist."
fi

if [ ! -f models/clip_l.safetensors ]; then
    wget -nc -O models/clip_l.safetensors "https://huggingface.co/comfyanonymous/flux_text_encoders/resolve/main/clip_l.safetensors"
else
    echo "clip_l.safetensors exist."
fi

if [ ! -f models/diffusion_pytorch_model.safetensors ]; then
    wget -nc -O models/diffusion_pytorch_model.safetensors "https://huggingface.co/black-forest-labs/FLUX.1-schnell/resolve/main/vae/diffusion_pytorch_model.safetensors"
else
    echo "diffusion_pytorch_model.safetensors exist."
fi

if [ ! -f models/t5xxl_fp16.safetensors ]; then
    wget -nc -O models/t5xxl_fp16.safetensors "https://huggingface.co/comfyanonymous/flux_text_encoders/resolve/main/t5xxl_fp16.safetensors"
else
    echo "t5xxl_fp16.safetensors exist."
fi

./build/bin/sd \
--cfg-scale 1.0 \
--clip_l ./models/clip_l.safetensors \
--diffusion-model ./models/flux1-schnell-q4_k.gguf \
--sampling-method euler \
--t5xxl ./models/t5xxl_fp16.safetensors \
--vae ./models/ae.safetensors \
-p "A tiger running through the jungle." \
-H 512 \
-W 512
